name: Add Up The Dice!
description:
The aim of the game is to make all the dice add up to the big number on top as many times as possible before time runs out.

  • Press 1, 2 and 3 to switch between the dice.
  • Press left and right to change the sides of the dice.
  • When all the dice faces add up to the big number on top, then the number changes and the timer adds on two seconds to its time.
